page.title: 05FARMS 1
page.content: {MONK FRYSTON} We interviewed 5 farmers in Monk Fryston,all arable farms ,3 owning pigs 1 also owns cattle. The farmers & their farms are W.Morley at Austin farm who keeps pigs and grows crops. R.Morley Hillside farm who has an arable & pig farm. J.Longbotton Main road farm is an arable & cattle farmer Mr.Bedford /Mr.Thompson at Austfield farm who has an arable farm,C.Stoker who keeps an arable & pigs. The two most popular grown crops are barley & wheat.Other crops are fodder beet, oil seed rape, oats, & vegetables. The total farming area in Monk Fryston is 150 hectares /718 acres. {SOUTH MILFORD} In South Milford the following farms are arable:_ Atkinson & son,A.Cawood, H.A.& L.Batty farming & stock as well,.John Burdin & Bradley are market
